Catalog_Raisonne:
Masterpieces from the Japanese painting collection of the Minneapolis Institute of Art
ミネアポリス美術館 日本絵画の名品 Cat.53
markings: censor seal: 極 {kiwame}; publisher seal: 泉市版 {Izumi-ichi ban}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
portfolio: Portraits of Actors on Stage (Yakusha butai no sugata-e 役者舞台之姿絵)
text: Related to the play Shimekazari kichirei Soga 住連餝吉例曽我, performed at the Kawarazaki Theater in the second lunar month of 1795.
title: Actor Ichikawa Komazō III as Shimobe Hachisuke
